short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Utilize Chrome's MediaSession API within multiple sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Media Session Master is a chrome extension that utilizes Chrome's MediaSession in sites that don't fully support it.

MediaSession API allows you to pause & play media within Chrome's UI and extends to the systems ability to recognize media being played. (You can use the pause & play buttons on your F1-12 keys)
